subject: College Athletics
Basketball
lead_paragraph: Talaya Robinson scored 19 points and Aminah Davis contributed 17 in top-ranked Monroe’s 82-66 win over No. 3 Mohawk Valley night in a National Junior College Athletic Association Division III game at Mount St. Michael Academy in the Bronx. Monroe (15-0) extended its home winning streak to 53 games and its winning streak over Division III opponents to 42.
